alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Nassau, northern St. Johns, northwestern Clay, Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. George to near Bryceville to near Maxville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Fernandina Beach, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach and Yulee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
